SELECT l.lo_id,u.eu_receipt_name,u.eu_receipt_phone,CONCAT(ep.epca_name , ec.epca_name , ea.epca_name,",",ep2.epca_name,ec2.epca_name ,ea2.epca_name ) AS a ,u.eu_sender_name,u.eu_sender_phone,l.lo_gmt_modified FROM logistics_orders l INNER JOIN express_user u ON l.eu_id=u.eu_id INNER JOIN express_provinces_city_areas ep ON u.ep_receipt_id = ep.epca_id INNER JOIN express_provinces_city_areas ec ON u.ec_receipt_id = ec.epca_id INNER JOIN express_provinces_city_areas ea ON u.ea_receipt_id = ea.epca_id INNER JOIN express_provinces_city_areas ep2 ON u.ep_sender_id = ep2.epca_id INNER JOIN express_provinces_city_areas ec2 ON u.ec_sender_id = ec2.epca_id INNER JOIN express_provinces_city_areas ea2 ON u.ea_sender_id = ea2.epca_id where 1=1
and l.lo_id like '%${id}%'
and u.eu_receipt_name like '%${name}%' or u.eu_sender_name like '%${name}%'
limit #{page},#{limit}
